channel.title: Glide always on even when it is at zero?/Exponential?
channel.description: On the left side i have a math/glide circuit. Even though its value is set at zero it still smoothens out the values a bit. Why? The patch starts out with a simple sample and hold with glide after it. Then goes to an osc and into a vca and then out. UPDATE: Is it possible to make it exponential somehow? Thanks:)
